### Sum of Reads

```{r}
n_Reads <- format(collect(filter(db, Attribute == "Number of Reads") %>% summarize(sum(Value))), big.mark=",",scientific=F)
sprintf("Number of Reads Sequenced: %s", n_Reads)
```
